entry.title: Overseas National Guard soldiers return to Southern Oregon
entry.summary: Oct. 3, 2025 11:25 a.m. Nearly 200 Oregon National Guard Soldiers assigned to the 1st Battalion, 186th Infantry Regiment return home to Oregon on Friday after serving for a year overseas. The soldiers were mobilized in October 2024 and stationed in the Sinai Peninsula in Egypt as part of the Multinational Force and Observers mission....

entry.title: “Simply sublime”
entry.summary: We all remember our first date. Our first car — it barely ran. Some remember their first bike, their first day of middle school, and their first sip of wine.

entry.title: Geneva Academy expands, contained on one campus
entry.summary: For the past few years, Geneva Academy has been using its Kline Street Campus, inside Wellspring Church in Roseburg, to teach the fourth-12th grade students, while the younger students used classroom space at Hucrest Church of God.

entry.title: UACT turns stage play into a fundraising opportunity with original production "Snapped"
entry.summary: Every theater kids dreams of their chance to visit Broadway, arguably the heart and soul of American theater. For the Umpqua Actors Community Theatre's (UACT) youth actors, that dream will become a reality after the group's latest production, "Snapped."

entry.title: Rōzubāgo e yōkoso: Delegates from Kuki-Shi, Japan, arrive in Roseburg
entry.summary: In 1993, two cities nearly 5,000 miles apart came together under a common value: to learn from each other and celebrate both similarities and differences.
